Description: Imitation (?) of Cypriot Black-on-Red ware pottery juglet; spherical body with disc base; cylindrical neck flaring to a funnel-shaped mouth; neck-ridge halfway up the height of the neck; vertical handle from shoulder to neck-ridge; pink to reddish-yellow clay, red-brown slip, decorated with black paint: group of narrow and broader bands around the shoulder and lower part of body (roughly drawn); broad bands around the neck; black on handle.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
